price: Mo a moapo nokorԑ, monhwε na moampa kyεw nnε Da yi. Dwuma a na modie no so akatua na yεde atua mo ka.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna kafarū lā taʿtadhirū al-yawma innamā tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
